attributes.action: make it illegal for qualified lawyers to become members of parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: lawyers have recently become the scurge of our society, twisting every new rule or item of legislation to ensure that there is disagreement or argument, thereby ensuring that lawyers become involved in all that goes in in our government and lives.  Only by removing the self serving interests of those who are lawyers will our society be allowed to develop.  Lawyers must no longer be allowed to become members of parliament.
